name: A Night in Guntown
description:
Made for Major Jam: Isolation.

3D Art - Greg Mckechnie

Programming - Ben Beasley

More Programming - Sam Newman

2D Graphics - Jake Miller

Extra Ideas - Bart Poyser

Music by Quantum Jazz

A local co-op shoot-out in a Jazz Club

Not quite finished. Spent far too long working on an online multiplayer feature that is 95% complete. I'll try put a patch out when I next have time - we started 3 days late as well.

Controls:

Press JUMP to Join!

WASD:

Walk Forward - W
Walk Back    - S
Turn Left    - A
Turn Right   - D
Shoot        - Shift
Jump / Join  - Space

Azerty Layout Keyboards

Walk Forward - Z
Walk Back    - S
Turn Left    - Q
Turn Right   - D
Shoot        - Caps Lock / verr maj
Jump / Join  - C

Mouse Controls:

Walk Forward - Move Mouse Forward
Walk Back    - Move Mouse Back
Turn Left    - Move Mouse Left
Turn Right   - Move Mouse Right
Shoot        - Left Click
Jump / Join  - Right Click

IJKL

Walk Forward - I
Walk Back    - K
Turn Left    - J
Turn Right   - L
Shoot        - H
Jump / Join  - O

Arrows

Walk Forward - Up Arrow
Walk Back    - Down Arrow
Turn Left    - Left Arrow
Turn Right   - Right Arrow
Shoot        - N
Jump / Join  - M
